book.title: The Alchemist
book.author: Paulo Coelho
book.description: A young shepherd's journey to realize his personal legend.

book.title: Pride and Prejudice

book.title: The Catcher in the Rye

book.description: A teenager's experiences in New York after being expelled from prep school.
